description.raw:
Fix for #32.

The solution is to change the final likelihood filename. The reason why this easy fix work is because ```set_log_lielihood``` is called withouth parameter IFF on the main thread.  And make_filename will simply ignore all instances that is None by its implementation.

There is a issue regarding of changing it this way. Likelihood Tab file is also generated through ```set_log_likelihood``` method. Modifying that will change the original ```log/likelihood.0.tab``` in single thread mode to ```log/likelihood.tab```.

This does not affect multiple instances since on multiple instances main thread do not take training job and all instances will call this function with a real-valued ```instance_index```

This will at least cause all current test would failed since ```likelihood.tab``` can't be align with ```likelihood.0.tab``` even if they have the exact same content. We could rewrite all the touchstone, or we may consider if we need to make sure that our modification does not change the tab file in single instance mode.
